id.description: The unique identifier of the subscription.

created_at.description: The date and time when the subscription was created.

customer_id.description: The unique identifier of the customer associated with the subscription.

external_customer_id.description: The external identifier of the customer associated with the subscription.

start_date.description: The date and time when the subscription is set to start.

end_date.description: The date and time when the subscription is set to end.

plan_id.description: The unique identifier of the subscription plan assigned to the subscription.

status.description: The current status of the subscription.
